message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds immense value for us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's worth every penny. We're offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that is not only worth $10,000 to you but also comes with a limited-time discount. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable.
